about_the_game:
After picking up a strange distress signal on their ship’s comms, B3-4K, a pilot for an intergalactic shipping company, lands on the remote exoplanet of Suna. While investigating the planet’s surface, B3-4K discovers a laboratory under the surface of the planet itself. Using your puzzle-solving skills, you’ll play as B3-4K to navigate the winding hallways and many rooms of the laboratory and locate the source of the distress signal, learning about the laboratory’s history as you do. Who –or what– has been calling out into the cold vastness of space? And what could they want?

Features:

• Explore the underground laboratory of the remote exoplanet Suna

• Push blocks, flip levers, and turn mirrors to solve puzzles in a top-down 2-D pixel art environment

• Experience the story and look for clues

• Investigate the hidden mysteries to uncover the truth

• Enjoy the original art and music

If you wish to play this on Mac please check out our website
detailed_description:
After picking up a strange distress signal on their ship’s comms, B3-4K, a pilot for an intergalactic shipping company, lands on the remote exoplanet of Suna. While investigating the planet’s surface, B3-4K discovers a laboratory under the surface of the planet itself. Using your puzzle-solving skills, you’ll play as B3-4K to navigate the winding hallways and many rooms of the laboratory and locate the source of the distress signal, learning about the laboratory’s history as you do. Who –or what– has been calling out into the cold vastness of space? And what could they want?

Features:

• Explore the underground laboratory of the remote exoplanet Suna

• Push blocks, flip levers, and turn mirrors to solve puzzles in a top-down 2-D pixel art environment

• Experience the story and look for clues

• Investigate the hidden mysteries to uncover the truth

If you wish to play this on Mac please check out our website

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+ (Intel editor) Big Sur 11.0 (Apple silicon Editor)
  • Processor: Both
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers (Intel processor) Rosetta 2 is required for Apple silicon devices running on either Apple silicon or Intel versions of the Unity Editor.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+ (Intel editor) Big Sur 11.0 (Apple silicon Editor)
  • Processor: Both
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers (Intel processor) Rosetta 2 is required for Apple silicon devices running on either Apple silicon or Intel versions of the Unity Editor.

name: BioDive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 580 2048SP
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 + higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.

short_description: Led to a remote exoplanet by a distress signal, B3-4K discovers a laboratory under the surface of the planet. Push blocks, flip levers, and turn mirrors to solve puzzles and explore the mysteries of the laboratory.
